title: Central square 3 bed. Amazing Location. Perfect for MIT/Harvard
posting_body: PROPERTY INFO
Rent: $4,195 / Month
Beds: 3
Bath: 1
Available Date: 09/01/2022
Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water
Amazing three-bedroom apartment located on the third floor of a well-managed building on Clinton Street in Cambridge.

Includes heat and hot water, hardwood floors, bright sunny living room, renovated tiled eat-in kitchen with dishwasher and disposal, private outdoor porch, one large bedroom and two regular bedrooms, full tiled bathroom, and plenty of closet space.
Apartment is cable/Internet-ready and coin-operated laundry facilities are available on site.
Just a five-minute walk to Central Square and a ten-minute walk to Harvard Square.
Perfect for graduate students or working professionals.
The Harvard/Clinton property is unique in that all of the apartments are spacious 3 bed apartments.
They are located close to Harvard University, MIT, Central Square, Harvard Square, and the Red Line.

The apartments feature hardwood floors throughout, high ceilings, nice entry, certamic tile eat-in kitchens with gas stove, disposal, dishwasher, refrigerator, private balconies in most apartments, spacious living room with a wall of windows, 1 modern bath with full tub, and 3 bedrooms of different sizes with ample closet space.
Heat and hot water is included in the rent.
Card operated laundry facilities and bike storage on site.
FEATURES
Eat-in Kitchen
Hardwood Floors
